asset.author: AllCladOfficial
asset.hookText:
http://www.all-clad.co.uk

To succeed a roasted turkey, it's important to prepare turkey basting it with melted butter and season with salt and pepper before put it in a hot oven (170°C). In order to keep the meat tender and juicy and get a beautiful golden crispy skin, baste the turkey regularly while it cooks with the cooking butter and a little honey. Accompany the turkey with chestnuts and grenaille potatoes roasted in the cooking juices, it's absolutely delicious!
